yage.resource.modelloader

Authors:
Eric Poggel

License:
LGPL

template ModelLoader()
Create Models from files and other sources. This is separated and used as a mixin to reduce the length of model.d.

void loadMs3d(char[] filename);
Load a model from a Milkshape3D model file. All materials, etc. referenced by this model are loaded through the Resource manager to avoid duplicates. Meshes without a material are assigned a default material. Uploading vertex data to video memory must be done manually by calling Upload().
